Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'nutrition' targeting readability level College. Limit the output to 50 words. Nutrition, a critical aspect of health, entails consuming a balanced diet rich in essential nutrients. These include macro-nutrients (carbohydrates, proteins, fats) and micro-nutrients (vitamins, minerals). Adequate hydration is also vital. Balanced nutrition supports growth, development, and maintenance of optimal health. It bolsters the immune system, enhances cognitive function, and fuels physical activities. Conversely, poor nutrition can lead to various health issues, underscoring the importance of informed dietary choices.

Nutrition is the intake of food that provides energy and promotes growth, maintenance, and repair of body tissues. It involves consuming a balanced diet of carbohydrates, proteins, fats, vitamins, and minerals to meet the body's nutritional needs. Adequate nutrition is essential for overall health and prevents chronic diseases like obesity, diabetes, and heart disease.
